description: Before the Champions League last 16 starts on Tuesday, plot the route to the final by picking your winners from every round.
title: Champions League: Vote on every knockout round
title_page: Champions League: Vote on every knockout round - and who will win the tournament - BBC Sport
maintext:
Sixteen teams. Four rounds. One winner.
Who will lift the Champions League trophy on 31 May in Munich?
The knockout stages take place on Tuesday and Wednesday, with the last 16 looking like a mouth-watering prospect.
Thanks to the tournament's new format, you can plot all the teams' route to glory.
BBC Sport readers have been voting all morning in our knockout round-by-round vote to predict who will be crowned European champions.
And your winners are..... Liverpool.
Ninety percent of voters predicted the Reds would beat Barcelona in the final
See how the round-by-round results went below.
